intents.name: history_intent
intents.description: Handles questions related to historical events, timelines, civilizations, and famous personalities.
examples: When did World War II end?
Tell me about the French Revolution.
What were the causes of World War I?
What was the significance of the Renaissance?

intents.name: science_intent
intents.description: Covers scientific concepts, principles, discoveries, and real-world applications from physics, chemistry, and biology.
examples: What is the structure of an atom?
What are the states of matter?
What is the difference between speed and velocity?

intents.name: maths_intent
intents.description: Deals with mathematical problems, formulas, definitions, and step-by-step problem solving.
examples: How to find the area of a circle?
What is the value of pi?

intents.name: fallback_intent
intents.description: Triggered when the userâ€™s question is outside the domains of History, Science, or Mathematics.
examples: Who is the Prime Minister of India?
What is the best movie of 2024?
Who won the FIFA World Cup?
